channel.title: Internet crashing problem
channel.description: Well if it isn't John here again :( Anyway I have lost my internet 2 days in a row when I ran my server i gives me a dc in my internet and laggs me after I get 30players. If you know the problem pls pm me my msn is John_95_07@hotmail.com! I will pay 1m rs2 cash if you find the fix. I'll only pay after 2 days test trying if it still crashes my pc. I don't know the problem because it crashes every computer in the house.. Not just one. I'm thinking its my modem and its new.

item.description:

ISP… What is a ISP, never heard of them tbh. Explain pls Tele…

My modem is Belkin…
